subject: College Athletics
Wrestling
NCAA Wrestling Championships
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Penn State, led by the 184-pound champion Quentin Wright, won its first N.C.A.A. wrestling title in 58 years by outpointing Cornell in Philadelphia.
snippet: Penn State, led by the 184-pound champion Quentin Wright, won its first N.C.A.A. wrestling title in 58 years by outpointing Cornell in Philadelphia.
